plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermissions:
TECHFIX requires background location to track technician work locations during field service. This enables:

• Automatic attendance tracking with precise location verification
• Continuous location monitoring during work hours for operational safety
• Real-time technician location visibility for administrators
• Emergency location assistance for field technicians

Without background location: Attendance tracking would be manual, technician safety monitoring would be lost, and operational efficiency would be significantly reduced.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: TECHFIX needs background location to continuously track technician work locations during field service hours. This ensures accurate attendance records and provides safety monitoring for field technicians.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: TECHFIX uses your location to verify attendance check-in/check-out and provide field service tracking while you're using the app.
